botNotConnected.message: Bot is not connected to any voice.

failedCommand.message: An error occured while executing this command!

userNotConnectedToVoice.message: Join a voice to use this command!

notConnectedToSameVC.message: You must be in the same voice as the bot to use this command!

UNEXPECTED_ERROR.title: Unexpected Error
UNEXPECTED_ERROR.message:
An error occurred in an unknown location. Please send a **ticket** with further context to assist fixing the problem.
**Sorry for the inconvenience :(**

general.name: General
general.description: > Verily, no additional particulars are provided.

debug.name: Debug
debug.description: > Forsooth, meant to troubleshoot the automaton in case aught is awry or doth linger overmuch.

music.name: Music
music.description: > A broad array of behests thou may employ to behold mine exquisite musical prowess.

ping.description: Let us witness how swiftly Ranni doth react to thy shot.

detailedDescription.title: /PING
detailedDescription.description: Showeth thee how long I needeth to devote myself unto thee.
detailedDescription.returns: > The present reaction time of Ranni, in units of "miliseconds" (ms).

ping.title: *Pong* - Verily, a splendid strike!

message.close: By my troth! How swiftly thou didst strike... I had but a moment of [] to parry thy blow.
message.normal:
Hoho, didst thou behold that? It took me a whopping [] to react.
 > That was close. >-<
message.slow:
Goaugh... Oh WAIT! I just dozed off. Wow, [] is way too much. I'll endeavor to concentrate more!
 > *Mayhap I should procure a coffee or some such?*

help.description: Presenteth a list of commands anon.

detailedDescription.title: /HELP
detailedDescription.returns: > A list of all the perks that Ranni doth bestow.

menu.title: What dost thou inquire?
menu.description: If thou art uncertain of what thou seek, a bar below shall display all commands enumerated.

detailedInfoPage.title: Here hast thou that which thou sought.

help.selectMenuPlaceholder: Choose a command for further elucidation

play.description: Performeth any song thou dost request.

detailedDescription.title: /PLAY
detailedDescription.description:
Plays any song thou dost enter in the box. Thou mayest offer either the `name` or a `link` to the song.
**YouTube**, **Spotify** and more are supported.

skip.description: Skippeth to the next song in the queue.

detailedDescription.title: /SKIP
detailedDescription.description: Skippeth to the next song in the queue.

skip.title: Skipped to:

pause.description: Holdeth the melody to take thy rest.

detailedDescription.title: /PAUSE
detailedDescription.description: Holdeth the melody to take thy rest.

pause.title: Paused playing.

detailedDescription.title: /REMIND
detailedDescription.description: Starts the reminders editing mode. the interface can be used to edit current reminders and add new ones.
